ygData.subject: Re: Spell List Update
ygData.msgSnippet: ... http://www.onelist.com/shareddir/eq_wizards/WizSpell0729.htm ... You do, I got a cookie error when trying to go there directly.  Just log into the Members
ygData.messageBody:
>
>Spell Chart has again been updated
>
>Here is the link.
http://www.onelist.com/shareddir/eq_wizards/WizSpell0729.htm
>
>You may have to log into onelist before getting the file.

You do, I got a cookie error when trying to go there directly. Just log
into the Members section and then click on the link for wizards. Once
there follow the link for Shared Files.

>I also have a few quick questions.
>
>#1 Can anybody tell me the damage and/or mana cost of the following spells
> Level Spell
> 8 Fingers of fire
> 16 Project Lightning
> 20 Fire Spiral of Al'Kabor
> 24 Frost Shock

110 mana for the following damages: 169(24th), 172(25th), 175(26), 178(27)
I assume it goes up again at 28th and then stops. Can't say for sure since
I am 2 bubbles from 28th :)
If I get a chance in game today I will try to remember to check the spells
of lower level.

> 29 Thunder Strike
> 29 Shock Spiral of Al'Kabor
> 34 Thunder Clap
> 34 Circle of Force
> 34 Lava Storm
> 39 Force spiral of Al'Kabor
> 44 Frost Storm
> 49 Wrath of Al'Kabor
> 49 Super Nova
>
>#2 Is there a place in Eurdin to buy spells other than the Library? They only
>seem to have Mid to High Level Spells

Well I bought Enstill from the Cleric guild in Erudin. At the time I was
low on runes and took the safe way out.

Also so you can add to the locations of spells. I have bought all 8 of my
current personal gate spells at Felwithe, as well as the following:
Glimpse, Eye of Zomm, Halo of Light, Site.

Leatherskin, Shieldskin, Force Shock and Frost Shock were all purchased at
Freeport

Levitate in Rivervale at the druid guild

Hope that helps, If I find myself with some spair time I'll see if I can
make a list of everything they sell.

Lomack, Knight Defender of the BCK
Master of Recruiting
www.bck.org
"The Crimson Knights"
Fennin Ro
